title: Unprecedented case with summoner leaving account
body:
I'm already corresponding with support but it takes ages, however I know more and more about the problem.

The case is my account was hacked few months ago and now I'm trying to recover this account. I managed to do so and everything would be fine but there is one thing that i can't find anything about it. My summoner (latrix lvl30 eune) seems to be separated to my account and instead i have this (newlevelkiller lvl5 na). I don't see anything about switching summoners, if it is possible and how. Can anybody tell me what has happened to my account?

replies.body:
We're unable to address account-specific issues like this here on *H&S*. Since we'll need to perform a thorough investigation into your account with our tools, I recommend being patient until our specialists get back to you.

If you have any other questions, let me know.

Well, I meant general question about operations like that because after my research i didn't find anything what could explain my current situation. I thought summoner is always one and permanently locked to main account, now I wonder what could change this situation. I didn't find any official informations about it so I will just suppose that it is your technical failure.
